In addition to the awards winning academic and arts subjects areas, most subject areas develop extension programs - poly-lingual plays, student quiz teams, and community outreach.<ref>[http://www.indicareer.com/India-Residential-Schools/Maharashtra/New-Era-High-School-Panchgani.html India Schools : New Era High School, Panchgani]</ref>
In addition to the awards winning academic and arts subjects areas, most subject areas develop extension programs - poly-lingual plays, student quiz teams, and community outreach.<ref>[http://www.indicareer.com/India-Residential-Schools/Maharashtra/New-Era-High-School-Panchgani.html India Schools : New Era High School, Panchgani]</ref>

The computer system, especially present in the Secondary Section, is [[Open Source]] based - highlighting [[Mandriva]] 2007 and [[Fedora Core]] 7, [[OpenOffice]], [[GIMP]], and many other software among its several computer labs.<ref name="computers"/>
+
The computer system, especially present in the Secondary Section, is [[Open Source]] based - highlighting [[Mandriva]] 2007 and [[Fedora (operating system)|Fedora Core]] 7, [[OpenOffice]], [[GIMP]], and many other software among its several computer labs.<ref name="computers"/>
